comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

A white vertical stripe appears to the right of the central image after (slowly) resizing the Firefox window. It doesn't happen to any size. Why do I think it is a bug? Because it doesn't happen to other browsers (Chrome, IE 8, Opera).

Reproducible: Sometimes
comments.creator: msdobrescu@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

A white vertical stripe appears to the right of the central image after (slowly) resizing the Firefox window. It doesn't happen to any size. Why do I think it is a bug? Because it doesn't happen to other browsers (Chrome, IE 8, Opera).

Reproducible: Sometimes
comments.author: msdobrescu@gmail.com

comments.creator: msdobrescu@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 519841
The white stripe is at the right of the central image
comments.author: msdobrescu@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110316 Firefox/4.0b13pre

Confirmed. Slowly resizing the firefox window displays a white vertical strip on the right side of the page. Able to reproduce in 3.6.16pre version also.
comments.creator: aravind@smartware.com
comments.author: aravind@smartware.com
comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110316 Firefox/4.0b13pre

Confirmed. Slowly resizing the firefox window displays a white vertical strip on the right side of the page. Able to reproduce in 3.6.16pre version also.

comments.creator: ykonotopov@gnome.org

comments.raw_text: Slow resize result of  Mihai's image

> I confirm this with Firefox 25.0.1 on my Gentoo box

Same here when i build FF31 with '-O3' on openSUSE. '-O2'-build seems fine with both bundled and system libpng.
But i don't think that our complete visual png breakdown is part of the original report, it's much worse. The only relevant things that i've found about it are:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=8518
http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/pngmoz.html(In reply to nE0sIghT from comment #3)
comments.creator: virtuousfox@gmail.com
comments.author: virtuousfox@gmail.com
comments.text:
> I confirm this with Firefox 25.0.1 on my Gentoo box

Same here when i build FF31 with '-O3' on openSUSE. '-O2'-build seems fine with both bundled and system libpng.
But i don't think that our complete visual png breakdown is part of the original report, it's much worse. The only relevant things that i've found about it are:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=8518
http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/pngmoz.html(In reply to nE0sIghT from comment #3)
